items.title: Ajit Mishra of Religare Broking recommends buying these stocks on Sept 12
items.description: We are seeing noticeable traction in the FMCG counters and ITC is trading in sync with the move. It has formed a buying pivot, after registering a breakout from bullish continuation pattern.

items.title: These 12 penny stocks have zoomed up to 300% in 2024; do you own any?

items.title: NBCC shares surge 5% on inking MoU with MTNL for Rs 1,600-cr project
items.description: The uptick in NBCC share price came after the company announced that it has inked a memorandum of understanding (MoU) with MTNL for a project worth Rs 1,600 crore.

items.title: Tata Steel signs GBP 500 mn grant funding pact with UK govt; stock up 3%
items.description:
The upward move in Tata Steel shares came after the company signed a £500 million grant funding pact with the UK government for a £1.25 billion green steel project in Port Talbot.

items.title: Gujarat Fluoro hits 52-wk high after arm incorporates German subsidiary

items.title: Ola Electric, JBM Auto, Olectra vroom as govt launches PM E-drive scheme
